title: Recommendation
description: A schema for recommendations in the OpenCode learning system

priority.description: The importance level of the recommendation

description.description: A clear and concise description of the recommendation
description.example: Use atomic commits for better git history

rationale.description: The reasoning behind why this recommendation is being made
rationale.example: Atomic commits make it easier to revert changes and understand the evolution of the codebase

created_at.description: ISO8601 datetime when the recommendation was created
